desc: Ease yourself into a calm state of being with our hand-poured, ethically sourced crystal intention soy candles . With fragrance blends unique to LightSeed, these high vibrational candles have been lovingly poured, each candle in alignment with the energy of its carefully selected crystals, and the intention set.

layout.text: CANDLES TO ENCHANT YOUR SPACE AND DELIGHT YOUR MYSTIC SENSES
